column4: Two key formulas used to calculate resonant frequencies in tubes.

Name: Infrahyoid muscles
column4: Muscles below the hyoid that are involved in pulling the hyoid bone down.

column4: Based on X-ray microbeam data - can you guess the word?.

Name: Guess the word - time traces
column4: Based on X-ray microbeam data - can you guess the word?.

column4: Modeling of the muscular-elastic and aerodynamic forces that are involved in phonation.

column4: Practice using key formulas to calculate aerodynamic properties of speech.
